description: IMST stands for "Inspiring Mobile and Satellite Communication Technology". We are a full-service engineering company and system house for radio systems, chip design, antennas and EDA software. As specialists in innovative technologies for radio engineering and microelectronics, our activities focus on customer-specific developments. With us, you have found your partner who can consult you on radio solutions and at the same time offer an accredited test laboratory for product approvals. You will find everything under one roof: we support you from the feasibility study to product design and from development to series production. In addition, we ensure that your products are certified according to the international regulatory guidelines.
